CampaignGenerator.Title: 01 - Campaign Generator
CampaignGenerator.Description: My hope is you can spin the wheel on this and run a game with what it gives you. Right now, there are four plots centered around two premises. \n***Make sure you read the entire campaign before you start- there is a ton of information and being prepared will set you up for success!***
Items: Discover The Fate of a Previous Adventuring Party
